overview: KGS has been Sr Vice President- Finance & Operations at Kotak Mahindra Investments Ltd., a leading Non Banking Finance Company. He was also the Chief Compliance Officer of the company and member of various management committees like the Asset Liability Committee, Risk Management Committee and Operating Committee. KGS has played senior roles in accounting, treasury and other finance functions in his 14 year stint at $8 billion+ Kotak Group, a leading financial services player in India. At Kotak, he was also associated with Business Standard, a leading financial newspaper publisher and media house for 5 years, where he played a key role in improving the operational and financial discipline of the company. Earlier, KGS worked with Ashok Leyland Finance Ltd.
